long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension will add a "Proof Sheet" button to the images page in Nextech. When it is clicked it generates a pdf containing all the images in the left preview pane with a header and labels on each image.

By adding or removing images from the left preview pane you can change what is added to the proof sheet.
